title: Aircraft Finance and Leasing Conference
body:
Tuesday, September 5: a half-day Transportation Securitization Workshop begins with an introduction to EETCs and Aircraft ABS, followed by an in-depth discussion of the credit analysis of EETCs, aircraft ABS and aircraft lessor debt. In addition, we will have presentations providing an overview of aircraft appraisal methodology as well as a detailed analysis of the aircraft value cycle.
The main conference Wednesday, September 6 includes presentations from senior management of leading aircraft leasing companies, aircraft manufacturers discussing their outlook and product strategy and leading aviation consultants discussing the global market for aircraft, lease rates and values.
